long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of manually pausing and resuming videos every time you switch tabs? Meet TabPause, your new best friend for effortless video management!

TabPause automatically pauses videos when you switch away from the tab containing your video content and seamlessly resumes playback when you return. No more interruptions or manual clicks—TabPause ensures a smooth and uninterrupted viewing experience across all your open tabs.
